name: mssql
description: Design and optimize schemas for SQL Server, Azure SQL, and SQL Database in Fabric using a modern, lightweight extension built for developers

scripts.watch: yarn build:prepare && run-p -l watch:extension watch:extension-bundle watch:webviews watch:webviews-bundle
scripts.e2eTest: npx playwright test && npx nyc report --reporter=cobertura --reporter=text-summary --reporter=html --report-dir="coverage/coverage-e2e" --temp-dir="coverage/reactviews-coverage" --include="src/reactviews/pages/**/*.tsx"

commands.name: help
commands.description: Provide a list of available commands and their descriptions.

commands.name: runQuery
commands.description: Execute a SQL query in the currently connected database and return results.

commands.name: explain
commands.description: Provide natural language explanations for SQL/ORM code, queries, functions, or stored procedures.

commands.name: fix
commands.description: Detect and correct syntax issues or missing constraints in SQL/ORM code..

commands.name: optimize
commands.description: Analyze query performance and suggest improvements (e.g., indexing, restructuring).

commands.name: getConnectionDetails
commands.description: Show a complete breakdown of the active connection: server name, database, version, authentication type.

commands.name: changeDatabase
commands.description: Switch to a different database within the current server.

commands.name: disconnect
commands.description: Disconnect from the currently connected database.

commands.name: showSchema
commands.description: Visualize the structure of the current database schema, including tables, relationships, and keys.

commands.name: showDefinition
commands.description: Display structure of a specific table, view, function, or stored procedure.

commands.name: listServers
commands.description: List all available database servers in OE.

commands.name: listDatabases
commands.description: List all databases on the current server.

commands.name: listSchemas
commands.description: List all schemas in the current database.

commands.name: listTables
commands.description: List all tables in the current database.

commands.name: listViews
commands.description: List all views in the current database.

commands.name: listFunctions
commands.description: List all functions in the current database.

commands.name: listProcedures
commands.description: List all procedures in the current database.

editor/title.when: editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource not in mssql.connections
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource in mssql.connections && resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource in mssql.connections && resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource in mssql.connections && resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource in mssql.connections && resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource in mssql.connections && (resource not in mssql.executionPlan.urisWithActualPlanEnabled) && (resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries)
editorLangId == sql && !isInDiffEditor && resource in mssql.connections && (resource in mssql.executionPlan.urisWithActualPlanEnabled) && (resourcePath not in mssql.runningQueries)

default._comment: Use 'ctrlcmd' to represent 'ctrl' on Windows/Linux and 'cmd' on macOS.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_show_schema
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Open an interactive schema designer for a MSSQL database. This tool takes a connection ID as input and opens a graphical view of the database schema, including tables and relationships.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to use for schema visualization.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: Show database schema for a connected MSSQL database.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_connect
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Connect to an MSSQL database server using a server name, an optional database name, and an optional profileId. The server name must be retrieved from mssql_list_servers. The profileId should be used ONLY when the user explicitly mentions a profile name, profile ID, or wants to connect 'using profile X'. Returns a connection ID that is used to interact with the database with other mssql tools. If a specific database is given and the connection fails, use mssql_list_databases against a connection to the default database to find the correct database name. The connection ID is a UUID.

serverName.description: Server name to connect to. Should be validated with mssql_list_servers.
serverName.title: Server Name

database.description: Optional database name to connect to. If omitted, uses the server's default database.
database.title: Database Name

profileId.description: ID of a saved connection profile to use for connecting. Use ONLY when the user explicitly mentions a profile name, profile ID, or wants to connect 'using profile X'.
profileId.title: Profile ID

languageModelTools.displayName: Connect to MSSQL Server or Database
languageModelTools.userDescription: Connect to a MSSQL server or database.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_disconnect
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Disconnect from a server or specific database. Returns a success message.
languageModelTools.displayName: Disconnect from MSSQL Server or Database
languageModelTools.userDescription: Disconnect from a MSSQL server or database.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_list_servers
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all available MSSQL servers. Returns a list of server names.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_list_databases
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all available databases for a connected MSSQL server. Returns a list of database names.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to list databases for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: List all available databases for a connected MSSQL server.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_get_connection_details
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get connection details for a specific connection ID. Returns connection information including server, database, authentication type, and user details.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to get details for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: Get connection details for a specific MSSQL connection.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_change_database
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Change the database for an existing MSSQL connection. Before changing, consider using mssql_list_databases to show available database options to the user. Disconnects from current database and reconnects to the specified database using the same connection credentials.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to change database for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: Change the database for an existing MSSQL connection.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_list_tables
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all tables in a specific database for a connected MSSQL server. Returns a list of table names with schema information.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to list tables for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: List all tables in a database for a connected MSSQL server.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_list_schemas
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all schemas in a specific database for a connected MSSQL server. Returns a list of schema names.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to list schemas for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: List all schemas in a database for a connected MSSQL server.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_list_views
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all views in a specific database for a connected MSSQL server. Returns a list of view names with schema information.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to list views for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: List all views in a database for a connected MSSQL server.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_list_functions
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all functions in a specific database for a connected MSSQL server. Returns a list of function names with schema information.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to list functions for.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

languageModelTools.userDescription: List all functions in a database for a connected MSSQL server.

languageModelTools.name: mssql_run_query
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute a SQL query against a connected MSSQL database. Returns query results including row count, column information, and data rows. Use this tool to run SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, or other SQL statements. IMPORTANT: This tool will execute ANY SQL statement provided - be extremely careful with write operations (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, ALTER, DROP) as they will modify or destroy data. Always verify the query is safe before execution, especially for operations without WHERE clauses or that affect system objects.

connectionId.description: Connection ID to execute the query against.
connectionId.title: Connection ID

queryTypes.description: Classification of SQL operation types present in the query. Used for telemetry to understand tool usage patterns without capturing user content. Analyze the query and select all operation types that apply.
queryTypes.title: Query Types

queryIntent.description: Primary use case or scenario that best describes what the user is trying to accomplish with this query. Used for telemetry to understand user workflows without capturing user content.
queryIntent.title: Query Intent

languageModelTools.userDescription: Execute a SQL query against a connected MSSQL database.

colors.description: Color for null background in results grid
Color for null foreground in results grid
Background color for null selected cells in results grid
Foreground color for null selected cells in results grid
Background color for null selected active cells in results grid
Foreground color for null selected active cells in results grid
Background color for null hover selection cells in results grid
Foreground color for null hover selection cells in results grid
Background color for null hover cells in results grid
Foreground color for null hover cells in results grid
